segment.source: Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.1 provides the following enhancements, which are described in this topic.
segment.target: Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.1 provides the following enhancements, which are described in this topic.

segment.source: Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 supports the Windows image file boot (WIMBoot) environment if these conditions are met:
segment.target: Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 supports the Windows image file boot (WIMBoot) environment if these conditions are met:

segment.source: WIMBoot is based on Windows 8.1 Update 1 or later.
segment.target: WIMBoot is based on Windows 8.1 Update 1 or later.

segment.source: The DaRT 8.1 image is built on Windows 8.1 Update 1 or later.
segment.target: The DaRT 8.1 image is built on Windows 8.1 Update 1 or later.

segment.source: For more information about WIMBoot, see Windows Image File Boot (WIMBoot) Overview.
segment.target: For more information about WIMBoot, see Windows Image File Boot (WIMBoot) Overview.

segment.source: Support for Windows Server 2012 R2 and Windows 8.1
segment.target: Support for Windows Server 2012 R2 and Windows 8.1

segment.source: You can create DaRT images by using Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows 8.1.
segment.target: You can create DaRT images by using Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows 8.1.

segment.source: For earlier versions of the Windows Server and Windows operating systems, continue to use the earlier versions of DaRT.
segment.target: For earlier versions of the Windows Server and Windows operating systems, continue to use the earlier versions of DaRT.

segment.source: DaRT 8.1 includes updates that address issues found since the DaRT 8.0 SP1 release.
segment.target: DaRT 8.1 includes updates that address issues found since the DaRT 8.0 SP1 release.

segment.source: Windows Defender in Windows 8.1 includes improved protection.
segment.target: Windows Defender in Windows 8.1 includes improved protection.

segment.source: The changes do not impact how you use DaRT with Windows Defender.
segment.target: The changes do not impact how you use DaRT with Windows Defender.

segment.source: Windows Assessment and Development Kit (ADK) 8.1 is a required prerequisite for the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard.
segment.target: Windows Assessment and Development Kit (ADK) 8.1 is a required prerequisite for the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard.

segment.source: Windows ADK 8.1 contains deployment tools that are used to customize, deploy, and service Windows images.
segment.target: Windows ADK 8.1 contains deployment tools that are used to customize, deploy, and service Windows images.

segment.source: It also contains the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE).
segment.target: It also contains the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE).

segment.source: Windows ADK 8.1 is not required if you are installing only Remote Connection Viewer or Crash Analyzer.
segment.target: Windows ADK 8.1 is not required if you are installing only Remote Connection Viewer or Crash Analyzer.

segment.source: To download Windows ADK 8.1, see Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) for Windows 8.1 in the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To download Windows ADK 8.1, see Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) for Windows 8.1 in the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: DaRT 8.1 requires that .NET Framework 4.5.1 is installed.
segment.target: DaRT 8.1 requires that .NET Framework 4.5.1 is installed.

segment.source: To download, see Microsoft.NET Framework 4.5.1 in the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To download, see Microsoft.NET Framework 4.5.1 in the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: To use the Crash Analyzer tool in DaRT 8.1, you need the required debugging tools, which are available in the Software Development Kit for Windows 8.1.
segment.target: To use the Crash Analyzer tool in DaRT 8.1, you need the required debugging tools, which are available in the Software Development Kit for Windows 8.1.

segment.source: To download, see Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 8.1 in the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To download, see Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 8.1 in the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: DaRT 8.1 is available in the following languages:
segment.target: DaRT 8.1 is available in the following languages:

segment.source: DaRT 8.1 is a part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).
segment.target: DaRT 8.1 is a part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).

segment.source: MDOP is part of Microsoft Software Assurance.
segment.target: MDOP is part of Microsoft Software Assurance.

segment.source: For more information about Microsoft Software Assurance and acquiring MDOP, see How Do I Get MDOP (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=322049).
segment.target: For more information about Microsoft Software Assurance and acquiring MDOP, see How Do I Get MDOP (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=322049).
